title: huge lag
body: I've been lagging after the recent update. Fps and ping stays the same but champ stays in one place and cannot move.

replies.body: Ooooo that sounds a bit like packet loss actually. Essentially that means your network isn't able to reliably send all of the data to our servers, and without all of that data some weird stuff starts happening, for example: your champion sliding across the map or ignoring your commands. We can know for sure by using this little [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and tossing in the game logs for the game that game you problems. Take a screenshot and post it here for us to go over together!
